org.microbean.jaxrs.cdi

Annotation Type JaxRsExtension.ResourceClass


  • @Documented
 @Inherited
 @Qualifier
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={})
public static @interface JaxRsExtension.ResourceClass
    A Qualifier annotation indicating that a BeanAttributes implementation is a JAX-RS resource class.

    This annotation cannot be applied manually to any Java element but can be used as an input to the BeanManager.getBeans(Type, Annotation...) method.

    Author:
    Laird Nelson
